alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:07AM CST until January 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake For the Pine Island Bayou...including Sour Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 815 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water inundates roads in lowland areas near the river. Low spots on Old Sour Lake Road are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 24.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 25.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.5 feet on 05/24/2000. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pine Island Bayou Sour Lake 25.0 24.7 Fri 7 am CST 25.4 25.2 24.6 &&
